text: I needed to do something different I had
been assigned by a magazine I was
working for to do a story on this ranch
out west and it was a horse whisperer
and you had to learn how to to get the
horses to do what you wanted to do and
one of his first tasks was to get the
horse to lift up its hopeful for you I
think I had sort of a nervous smirk on
my face the whole thing seemed
ridiculous to me I'm from New York City
and you know I'm out on this ranch and
lifts a horse's leg up I like everyone
else would approach the horse and then
try to pick up the leg well if you've
ever tried this you cannot pick up a
horse's leg unless the horse wants to
pick up his own leg you know I did it
over and over and over again and finally
the horse whisperer set so Joe you're
learning a lesson learnt you're learning
the lesson here doing the same thing
over and over you need to figure out how
to do this differently if you want to
have a different result and I thought
about that in terms of my love life
doing the same thing over and over
wasn't working and that's when I decided
to spend $6,000 to hire a matchmaker
to find my next husband
